## Exercises

#### Exercise 1
```{r}
library(tidycensus)
va_pop_2010 <- get_decennial(
  geography = "county",
  state = "VA",
  variables = c("P001001"),
  year = 2010,
  show_call = TRUE,
  geometry = TRUE
)
```
#### Exercise 2
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

va_pop_2010 %>%
  ggplot(aes(fill = value)) +
  geom_sf() +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "magma")
```
